snippet: Tony Parker plans to play in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals against the Miami Heat, Spurs Coach Gregg Popovich said Tuesday.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs guard Tony Parker will play in Game 1 of the NBA finals against the Miami Heat; had missed second half of game against Oklahoma City Thunder due to aggravated left ankle injury.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker plans to play in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals against the Miami Heat, Spurs Coach Gregg Popovich said Tuesday.

headline.main: Parker Plans to Play in Game 1
headline.print_headline: Parker Plans to Play in Game 1
